actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution making minority party appointments for the 111th Congress.
subjects: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

summary.text: Makes minority party appointments to the following Senate Committees for the 111th Congress: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; (2) Foreign Relations; (3) Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs; (4) Small Business and Entrepreneurship; and (5) Aging.

titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for the 111th Congress.
